foods.name: Dal (Lentil Curry)
foods.description: Traditional lentil curry, protein-rich and grounding
foods.recommendations: Excellent for all body types. Pair with warm rice for better digestion.

foods.name: Roti (Wheat Bread)
foods.description: Whole wheat flatbread, staple of Indian cuisine
foods.recommendations: Best with cooked vegetables and ghee for Vata balance.

foods.name: Samosa
foods.recommendations: Avoid for Pitta. Enjoy occasionally with cooling yogurt.

foods.name: Idli (Steamed Cake)
foods.description: Steamed rice and lentil cake, light and easy to digest
foods.recommendations: Perfect for Pitta. Serve with cooling coconut chutney.

foods.name: Dosa (Crepe)
foods.description: Crispy fermented rice and lentil crepe
foods.recommendations: Good for all doshas. Add ghee for Vata support.

foods.name: Poha (Flattened Rice)
foods.description: Light breakfast made with poha, vegetables and spices
foods.recommendations: Best eaten warm. Good for digestion.

foods.name: Pulao (Rice Pilaf)
foods.description: Rice cooked with vegetables and spices
foods.recommendations: Nourishing and grounding. Add ghee for better taste.

foods.name: Rajma (Kidney Beans)
foods.recommendations: Heavy but nourishing. Pair with light vegetables.

foods.name: Chole (Chickpeas)
foods.recommendations: Add ginger for better digestion.

foods.name: Khichdi
foods.description: Rice and lentil mix, healing comfort food
foods.recommendations: Excellent for digestion and all doshas. Best when warm.

foods.name: Paneer Tikka
foods.recommendations: Avoid excess for Pitta. Balance with cooling vegetables.

foods.name: Bhel (Puffed Rice Snack)
foods.description: Savory snack with puffed rice, vegetables and chutneys
foods.recommendations: Light snack. Avoid at night due to heating quality.

foods.name: Pav Bhaji
foods.recommendations: Rich and heavy. Occasional indulgence. Avoid for Pitta/Kapha.

foods.name: Dhokla
foods.recommendations: Light and nutritious. Good for all doshas.

foods.name: Aloo Paratha
foods.recommendations: Filling and grounding. Serve with yogurt to cool.

foods.name: Upma (Semolina Porridge)
foods.recommendations: Warm and comforting. Easy to digest.

foods.name: Sambhar (Vegetable Stew)
foods.description: South Indian vegetable stew with lentils
foods.recommendations: Excellent for digestion. Pairs well with rice or idli.

foods.name: Raita (Yogurt Salad)
foods.recommendations: Perfect cooling side. Best for Pitta balance.

foods.name: Biryani
foods.description: Aromatic rice with meat or vegetables
foods.recommendations: Rich and heavy. Enjoy occasionally. Add cooling raita.

foods.name: Masala Dosa
foods.recommendations: Filling and satisfying. Good energy source.

foods.name: Chaat (Pani Puri)
foods.recommendations: Fun street snack. Can be heavy on digestion.

foods.name: Moong Dal Tadka
foods.recommendations: Gentle on digestion. Great for recovery diets.

foods.name: Gajar Halwa (Carrot Pudding)
foods.recommendations: Warming and nourishing. Best in winter.

foods.name: Chikhalwali Salad
foods.recommendations: Light and refreshing. Perfect for summer.

foods.name: Toor Dal with Vegetables
foods.recommendations: Nourishing and balancing for all doshas.

foods.name: Methi Paratha
foods.recommendations: Grounding and nutritious. High in iron.

foods.name: Uttapam (Savory Pancake)
foods.description: Rice and lentil pancake with toppings
foods.recommendations: Satisfying breakfast. Add vegetables for more nutrition.

foods.name: Kadi (Chickpea Flour Curry)
foods.recommendations: Good with rice. Aids digestion.

foods.name: Spinach Saag
foods.recommendations: Cooling and detoxifying. Best for Pitta and Kapha.

foods.name: Aloo Sabzi (Potato Curry)
foods.recommendations: Light and easy to digest. Great side dish.
